name: Cshark
description:
Welcome to Cshark !

Incarnate a pirate ship and fight your way towards wealth and glory !

CREDITS

Game Design : Julien Bulanger - Raphaël Ortolan

Programming : Grégoire Pierillas

Art & Assets : Laura Delignières - Alexandre Linel

CONTEXT

This game was made during a 3 days gamejam, our goal was to make a tutorial level of whatever kind of game we wanted to make.

I hope you'll enjoy it and please feel free to comment on what you think we could do better below, to improve your experience and make it more fun.
